Title: Establishes limitations upon real property tax levies in N.Y. city
Summary: Limits, in cities having a population of one million or more, the annual increase in real property taxes.
LawCode: Add ยง3-d, Gen Muni L; amd ยง23, Munic Home R L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the municipal home rule law, in relation to establishing limitations upon real property tax levies in cities with a population of one million or more
